name: DO LIKE ME
description:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.NoCompany.dolikeme

DO LIKE ME

DO LIKE ME – Endless arcade game where you need to survive as long as possible!

Take a cute animal as your partner and move only forward!

DO LIKE ME is designed for players who like to have fun. The game brings you a fabulous delight every time you go to a new record.

Gather a collection of diverse characters and become a real hero in DO LIKE ME
